title: Suite Of Micro-mosaic Jewelry, 1800–25
provenance: Gift of Frederick Saal in honor of Dr. and Mrs. Joseph Saal
dimensions:
Lying on a flat surface:
Necklace: H x W x D: 0.4 x 45.5 x 2.8 cm (3/16 x 17 15/16 x 1 1/8 in.)
Bracelet: H x W x D: 0.4 x 2.3 x 18.9 cm (3/16 x 7/8 x 7 7/16 in.)
Bracelet: H x W x D: 0.4 x 2.4 x 18.3 cm (3/16 x 15/16 x 7 3/16 in.)
Earrings: H x W x D: 1 x 1.2 x 3.5 cm (3/8 x 1/2 x 1 3/8 in.)
Earrings: H x W x D: 1 x 1.2 x 3.5 cm (3/8 x 1/2 x 1 3/8 in.)
Brooch: H x W x D: 0.9 x 3.1 x 2.3 cm (3/8 x 1 1/4 x 7/8 in.)
Brooch: H x W x D: 0.9 x 3.2 x 2.3 cm (3/8 x 1 1/4 x 7/8 in.)
Pendant: H x W x D: 0.3 x 2 x 1.5 cm (1/8 x 13/16 x 9/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of Frederick Saal in honor of Dr. and Mrs. Joseph Saal
description: Suite of jewelry with gold filigree mounts around micromosaic oval scenes of Rome in cobalt blue borders; comprising a necklace centered by a view of St Peter's, with various ruins, and the Colisseum, and Pantheon; a pair of gold bracelets each with one arch view, a pair of earrings, and a pair of brooches.

exhibitions.title: Rooms with a View: Landscape & Wallpaper

tombstone.epitaph:
Suite Of Micro-mosaic Jewelry, 1800–25.
1800–25. Gold, glass mosaics. Gift of Frederick Saal in honor of Dr. and Mrs. Joseph Saal. 1991-160-1/8.
